item.description: Word of the day from our Ecosystem Lead @dmat_2 : “Security isn’t set it and forget it. Don’t be reactive, be proactive.”

item.title:
RT by @fuzzland_: It's tragedy for safe being compromised and thus harmed bybit 😢. Lesson here is NEVER TRUST.
The principle of this theory is validating everything on your own. 3-step checks are necessary:
1. Simulate to check the transaction outcome, Safe already integrated Tenderly so it's just one-click.
2. Cross-check pre-sign data on website and wallet extension. Rabby/MetaMask displays the data in a clean way. To, value, data, operation are the critical field you will be checking at.
3. Cross-check pre-sign data on wallet and hardware wallet. Match every critical field before you sign. Kudos to OneKey team!
item.dc:creator: @tonykebot
item.description:
It's tragedy for safe being compromised and thus harmed bybit 😢. Lesson here is NEVER TRUST.

The principle of this theory is validating everything on your own. 3-step checks are necessary:

1. Simulate to check the transaction outcome, Safe already integrated Tenderly so it's just one-click.

2. Cross-check pre-sign data on website and wallet extension. Rabby/MetaMask displays the data in a clean way. To, value, data, operation are the critical field you will be checking at.

3. Cross-check pre-sign data on wallet and hardware wallet. Match every critical field before you sign. Kudos to OneKey team!

nitter.freedit.eu/safe/status/1894768522720350673#m

item.title:
R to @fuzzland_: 🛡️ How Blaz+ Protects Berachain Builders 🐻⛓️：
✅ Continuous Smart Contract Pentesting → Identifies vulnerabilities before hackers do.
🔔 Real-Time Threat Alerts → Instant detection of exploits, liquidity drains, and governance attacks.
🤖 Automated Mitigation Bots → Freezes malicious transactions on impact.
We deliver products tailored to your needs, and all alerts will be delivered through your preferred channel. A security report will automatically be generated weekly for your company.
Berachain moves fast. Your security should move faster.
item.dc:creator: @fuzzland_
item.description:

✅ Continuous Smart Contract Pentesting → Identifies vulnerabilities before hackers do.

🔔 Real-Time Threat Alerts → Instant detection of exploits, liquidity drains, and governance attacks.

🤖 Automated Mitigation Bots → Freezes malicious transactions on impact.

We deliver products tailored to your needs, and all alerts will be delivered through your preferred channel. A security report will automatically be generated weekly for your company.

Berachain moves fast. Your security should move faster.

item.title:
🔐 Thrilled to join the Pivot Ecosystem @0xPivot_
At FuzzLand, we believe real-time security is the backbone of innovation. We’re building a safer, more resilient Web3 by reinforcing defenses before threats become exploits. Let’s push the boundaries of security and growth!
